image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot of a modern Australian manufacturing facility interior. The scene features a diverse group of maintenance technicians and a facility manager wearing high-visibility vests, hard hats, and safety glasses. They are standing near a large industrial conveyor system. One technician is holding a tablet (back facing the camera) while pointing at a piece of machinery, discussing with the manager. The lighting is professional and bright, highlighting the cleanliness and organization of the facility. There is no text or words visible in the image. The atmosphere conveys safety, technology, and compliance.
